description:
Malin Akerman and Taissa Farmiga are starring in the movie, which is being directed by Todd Strauss-Schulson, of "A Very Harold and Kumar 3D Christmas."Malin Akerman 和Taissa Farmiga将领衔主演由拍摄《寻宝奇遇》的Todd Strauss-Schulson导演的恐怖电影《最后的女孩》。

Silicon Valley star Thomas Middleditch and The Vampire Diaries’ Nina Dobrev have joined The Final Girls, a horror comedy from Sony Pictures Worldwide Acquisitions being directed by Todd Strauss-Schulson. 《硅谷》中的明星 Thomas Middleditch 和《吸血鬼日记》中的Nina Dobrev也加入了《最后的女孩》这部由索尼公司投资拍摄的电影。

Also joining the production are Adam Devine(Pitch Perfect, Comedy Central's Workaholics) andAlexander Ludwig (Hunger Games).同样加入这部电影的还有Adam Devine（《完美音调》，《喜剧中心的工作狂》）和Alexander Ludwig（《饥饿游戏》）。

Malin Akerman and Taissa Farmiga are starring in the meta movie which centers on a girl who, along with her friends, is mysteriously transported into the world of an iconic ’80s horror flick, which starred her recently deceased mother (Akerman), a famous scream queen. Malin Akerman和Taissa Farmiga将领衔主演这部电影。电影讲述了一个与朋友们一起被神秘地送到了一个标志性的八十年代的恐怖电影的世界，其中还有她刚刚去世的母亲——一个著名的尖叫女王（由Akerman扮演）的出现。

The group must try to survive the movie and defeat its crazed killer.他们需要在这部电影中生存下来并且打败其中的疯狂的杀手。

description:
Ginnifer Goodwin and Josh Dallas said, "I do"! The Once Upon a Time costars tied the knot in a sunset ceremony in LA on Saturday, according to reports.Ginnifer Goodwin和Josh Dallas终于互相说“我愿意”了！媒体报道，这两位《童话镇》明星周六在洛杉矶举行了一场日落沙滩婚礼。

Ginnifer walked down the aisle in a custom Monique Lhuillier dress as 30 close friends and family members awaited the big moment. The couple went public with their plans to marry in October, saying, "We are so thrilled to announce our engagement and can't wait to celebrate with our friends and family, including our second family at Once Upon a Time." Ginnifer穿的是Monique Lhuillie婚纱，他们的婚礼只邀请了包括亲戚和好友在内的30位嘉宾见证他们人生这一重要时刻。这对夫妻在去年10月宣布在筹办婚礼，他们说：“我们很激动的宣布我们订婚的消息，等不及想和我们的朋友、家人，包括《童话镇》剧组的小伙伴们一起分享我们婚礼的幸福时刻。

The show's fans grew even more excited in November, when their pregnancy news emerged. Earlier this month, Josh proved he's a real-life Prince Charming during a sweet trip to the airport with Ginnifer. Congratulations, Ginnifer and Josh!而之前他们宣布女方怀孕的时候，《童话镇》的观众们更是欣喜不已。本月早些时候，两人在去机场的路上Josh一路上的体贴行动已经完美的证明了他就是Ginnifer的白马王子。恭喜Ginnifer和Josh！

description:
沪江英乐：以心为址，寄出爱的明信片。汝之倾慕，邮戳盖下为证。上尉诗人爱的明信片《Postcards》中文字幕释出！蓝天暖风椰树吉他，从播放《You Are Beautiful》的缓慢镜头仿佛一下子回到了那个沉醉不已的时期，诗人这次玩了回爱意 Postcards，拼不出正确的英文单词，但却能给你挚爱永恒。

【上尉诗人新单《Postcards》中文字幕版】

歌词：

Sundays sitting on your back porch
And I came up with a couple of cords
And I played for you

You let me keep you entertained
With stories I exaggerate
That you know aren't true

And as you sit there making daisy chains
And I throw in a hand granate
And tell you how it is I really feel for you

I'm sending postcards from my heart
With love for a postmark and then..
You know that you make me feel like we've been caught
Like kids in the school yard again
And I can't keep it to myself
Can't spell it any better
L.O.V.E forever
I hope you know that I'm sending a postcard
I don't care who sees what I sent
Or if the whole world knows what's in my head

We chased the sun til it got away
On a bicycle that your daddy made
But not made for two

Then we sat out on your rocking chair
You with a flower in your hair
That I found for you

But then monday always comes around
And it's sad 'cause I can't see you now
Wan't you to know you're always in my head

I'm sending postcards from my heart
With love for a postmark and then..
You know that you make me feel like we've been caught
Like kids in the school yard again
And I can't keep it to myself
Can't spell it any better
L.O.V.E forever
I hope you know that I'm sending a postcard
I don't care who sees what I sent
Or if the whole world knows what's in my head

You know sometimes it's hard to see
You say the world that torture me
But inside I know exactly how I feel
The things that I can't say out loud
I'll find a place to write it down
I hope that they will find you in the end

I'm sending postcards from my heart
With love for a postmark and then..
You know that you make me feel like we've been caught
Like kids in the school yard again
And I can't keep it to myself
Can't spell it any better
L.O.V.E forever
I hope you know that I'm sending a postcard
I don't care who sees what I sent
Or if the whole world knows what's in my head

know, know, know
All the things I want you to
know, know, know

description:
It’s National Sibling Day! To celebrate, we’ve come up with a killer list of great sibling relationships throughout TV history. 为了庆祝国际兄弟姐妹节，我们精心为您挑选了几对美剧历史上的好兄弟、好姐妹。

Ross and Monica Gellar - "Friends" 《老友记》中的Ross和 Monica Gellar

He was the dorky and loveable paleontologist and she was the obsessive, clean freak, mother hen of the group.一个是笨拙可爱的古生物学家，一个有点神经质，有洁癖，是朋友们中的大姐大。

Monica and Ross set the bar for awesome brother-sister relationships on TV. Monica 和Ross毫无疑问是电视荧幕上值得标榜的姐弟关系的好榜样。

Dan and Jenny Humphrey - "Gossip Girl" 《绯闻女孩》中的Dan和Jenny Humphrey

Lonely boy Dan and sweet sister Jenny were always the outsiders at their fancy Upper East Side private school in "Gossip Girl" –- having no money and living in Brooklyn put a damper on their social life – but that didn’t stop them from trying to fit in. 孤独男孩Dan和体贴妹妹Jenny生活在布鲁克林区并且很穷，所以他们成了《绯闻女孩》描绘的上东区私立学校光鲜生活的局外人。但是他们并没有放弃想要融入大家的愿望。

Damon and Stefan Salvatore– "The Vampire Diaries"《吸血鬼日记》中的Damon和 Stefan Salvatore

Our supernatural pair on the list, the Salvatore brothers have what you might call a strained relationship -– a centuries old love triangle can cause a rift in even the strongest of brotherhoods. 作为表单上的超人类组合，Salvatore兄弟的关系有点微妙---一个世纪的三角恋让他们兄弟间紧密的联系产生了些许裂痕。

Thanks to their immortality, they both have the ability to hold a serious grudge, but when they’re not romantic rivals, they actually have a pretty badass bromance going on.多亏他们可以长生不老，他们才能对彼此犯的错误念念不忘。不过他们在浪漫方面可并不是对手，相反，他们之间也很是基情四射的哦。
